cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: Share a dorm room with a maximum of 4 guests, with opening window and lockers, a comfortable room with options for shorter or longer-term stays!

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Each of our Double Rooms provide a cozy nights sleep for 1-2 people maximum. Shared bathrooms across the hall. Our spacious communal kitchen/dining /living area with aircon is a perfect spot to have a cup of tea and a chat with other guests.

privates.name: Superior Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our comfy Twin Room has 2 x Single Beds, complete with luxury pillows, linen and towels supplied in our superior 2-bedroom apartment (Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom, so a maximum of 2 other guests at any one time)

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our cozy Superior Queen Room features luxury bedding and pillows makes this room a snuggly spot for relaxing & sleeping. Towels provided. Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom means you share the apartment with a maximum of 2 other guests.

privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Deluxe Queen Room sleeps a maximum of 2 x people. Luxury linen and towels provided. Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom means you are sharing the apartment with a maximum of 3 other guests.
